Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.25.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.25.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package azcopy is earlier than 10.25.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-45288
